xwikidoc.title: XWiki Advanced Administration Tools
xwikidoc.content:
The following pages allow advanced administration of an XWiki or XWiki farm:
{{velocity}} #if(!$context.context) {{warning}}This application is not fully installed. Please visit [[ToolsInstall]] to complete it's installation{{/warning}} #end {{/velocity}}
== Configuration Tools ==
* [[XWiki Configuration Check>>CheckXWikiConfig]]: tool to check the XWiki configuration * [[Programming Rights Check>>CheckProgrammingRights]]: tool to check that proper programming rights are set on standard pages
== Activity Tools ==
* [[Activity Report>>ActivityReport]]: tool to check activity on all wikis of a farm * [[User Rights Check>>CheckRights]]: tool to check the rights of a specific user * [[Flush Cache>>FlushCache]]: tool to flush the cache * [[Requests Status>>RequestsStatus]]: tool to view running requests (need monitor plugin activation)
== Storage Management Tools ==
* [[Used Space>>UsedSpace]]: tool to check the disk space used by your wikis * [[Shrink Recycle Bins>>ShrinkRecycleBins]]: tool to empty the recycle bins of your wikis
== Upgrade Tools ==
* [[Preferences Pages Check>>CheckPreferencesPages]]: tool to upgrade XWiki preferences pages to syntax 2.0 * [[Wiki Diff>>WikiDiff]]: tool to check differences between a wiki and a default XAR
== Export Tools ==
* [[Export Tools>>ExportTools]]: export tools
== MySQL Tools ==
* [[MySQL Database Encoding Check>>CheckDBEncoding]]: tool to check the MySQL database encoding * [[MySQL Indexes Check>>CheckIndexes]]: tool to check MySQL indexes * [[Run Query>>RunQuery]]: tool to run queries on the MySQL database * [[Sanity Check>>SanityCheck]]: tool to check the consistency of the database
